__e: Lex may be too afraid to tell you, but I'm not. No one in Smallville wants you here.
You can't keep secrets when Lex's life is in danger.
You think that lex is still that same man you saved on the bridge eight years ago?
Lex, I know, in your world, nothing comes without a paycheck.
Lex, I'm tired of playing hardball. Or softball, or any ball, for that matter.
Look Lex, I know that Lois feels really badly about this, but there's really no way she's going to be able to-
There could never, ever be anything between me and Lex.
6 months ago, I never would have gone to someone like Lex, and groveled for a job that I don't even want.
With all due respect, I work for Lex and not his girlfriend.
And I want to know why Lex didn't.
The point is that I got your back but Lex won't.
Now, I know that Lex would never do anything to hurt the love of his life, but who did?
I guess Lex did something right in this place.
You know, Lex may have been your friend a lifetime ago, Clark, but... eventually, he would have killed you.
You know,it's nice to finally see what lex saw in you.
I think Lex picked me to be the best man because he knew... how comfortable I was speaking in front of people.
i don't know. lex told me where to find you.
Lex warned me not to see you.
